title: Swift Coding Environments
subtitle: A collection of basic coding environments for Swift Playgrounds

documents.title: Text Console
documents.detailSubtitle: Make interactive programs and text-based console games with this Swift sandbox.
documents.description: Use the console to read and write text. Add some color with the included ColoredString class. See included README for available commands.

documents.title: Turtle Console
documents.detailSubtitle: Navigate a robotic turtle around the screen to make beautiful art!
documents.description: Draw lines, arcs, and fills of any color. See the included README file for available commands.
